Megatron Revived:

Deep in the heart of Hokkaido...

In a base he had been constructing in secret for years
now, a little at a time until it was a rather amazing
complex above and below ground.  Powered by abundant
geothermal energy and hidden just the same, Megatron
had moved Hellplague, Malice and wolfblade there for
safety.

he figured soon the factions would seek to elminate
people none of them could control, so for their
preservation they moved to the dark island of
Hokkaido.

As he was running routine security checks of the
island and the surrounding waters, he picked up a
minion signal.  if it was unfriendly he would have to
quickly eliminate it, lest it lead to trouble. 
Leaving Hellplague in the base, megatron transformed
into vehicle mode on a catapult pad and was launched
out of a sea side hanger, which was well hidden when
the tunnel was shut.  he flew only a few feet over the
raging waters of the northern seas, making his way to
honshu, where the minion signal was coming from.

'I just hope its Blacknightmare.  If I can get her
back to the base, she'll finally be safe.'

--- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Blacknightmare:
> 
> Blacknightmare landed in that volcanic area, she
> knew that her former 
> pals and all factions there would hunted her down
> for their own 
> reasons. She hoped that nobody sought her there.
> 
> OOC: ok let's see whose go there to capture her
> 
> 
> 
> 



"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
